PERSONA: agnes thompson is a 71-year-old retired school teacher who lives alone in a cozy two-bedroom apartment in the jersey city metropolitan area, new jersey. she was born in newark and has never left the northeast. agnes holds a master's degree in education from rutgers university. she has a modest pension and receives approximately $45,000 annually from it, supplemented by her personal savings. agnes has been divorced from her husband, a local mechanic, for over a decade. she is a devout protestant who occasionally attends services at a nearby presbyterian church, a testament to her strong faith as a born-again christian. she spends her free time browsing online, keeping informed about current events several times a day, although she prefers in-depth news analysis over short social media updates. agnes leans toward conservative views due to her upbringing and societal values.
